about_the_game:
Do you mind a little historical background?


In this visual novel you play as young opposition activist who is kidnapped by the security services and taken to Vladimir Putin's personal mansion. You think it's your last day, but things turn out for the best. Putin shows you a friendliness that quickly becomes a hot passion.

If you're gonna have sex, it's with the President.

Getting to know Putin personally you will learn that under the official suit hides a hot jock with various perverted fetishes... You will get the opportunity to satisfy all his lustful fantasies.

Your relationship with Putin depends on you. Choose for yourself how to respond to the dictator.

Make fateful decisions that will determine the nature of your relationship with Vladimir Putin. Everything depends only on you!

content_descriptors.notes: Naked people, sexual themes, sexual abuse, gay sex,  brainwashing, BDSM fetish, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drinking alcohol, drinking alcohol through holes not intended for this.

name: Sex with Putin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 940MX
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Have sex with one of the hottest Presidents in the world. A visual novel about a lustful dictator.
